sentences.sContent: By diplomatic standards, this was outrageous behaviour.
sentences.sCn: 按外交标准，这是不可接受的行为。

synos.tran: 粗暴的；可恶的；令人吃惊的

words.tran: 凌辱，强奸；对…施暴行；激起愤怒

trans.tranCn: 粗暴的；可恶的；令人吃惊的
trans.tranOther: If you describe something as outrageous, you are emphasizing that it is unacceptable or very shocking
